update t_phoneinfo set Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Uptimestamp = #{uptimestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DataState = #{dataState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMEI = #{IMEI,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PhoneType = #{phoneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Des = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SeatId = #{seatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UnitId = #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
